trans-unit.source: Manages a compact array of bit values, which are represented as Booleans, where <see langword="true" /> indicates that the bit is on (1) and <see langword="false" /> indicates the bit is off (0).
The <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> class is a collection class in which the capacity is always the same as the count.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>類別是在其中的容量等同一律為計數集合類別。

trans-unit.source: Elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> by increasing the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> property; elements are deleted by decreasing the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 項目會加入<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>藉由增加<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A>屬性; 刪除項目藉由降低<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The size of a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> is controlled by the client; indexing past the end of the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.The <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> class provides methods that are not found in other collections, including those that allow multiple elements to be modified at once using a filter, such as <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.And%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Or%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Xor%2A> , <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Not%2A>, and <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SetAll%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 大小<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>控制用戶端，則索引超過結尾<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>。<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>類別提供方法，包括允許修改一次使用篩選器，例如多個元素的其他集合中找不到<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.And%2A>， <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Or%2A>， <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Xor%2A> ， <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Not%2A>，和<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SetAll%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> class is a structure that provides the same functionality as <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>, but with faster performance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32>類別是提供做為相同的功能結構<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>，但更快的效能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> is faster because it is a value type and therefore allocated on the stack, whereas <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> is a reference type and, therefore, allocated on the heap.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> 因為它是實值類型速度會加快，因此在堆疊上配置而<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>是參考類型，因此，在堆積上配置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32?displayProperty=nameWithType> can store exactly 32 bits, whereas <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> can store a variable number of bits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32?displayProperty=nameWithType> 可以儲存完全 32 位元，而<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>可以儲存可變位元數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> stores both bit flags and small integers, thereby making it ideal for data that is not exposed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> 儲存位元旗標和小整數，因此它適用於資料未公開給使用者。

trans-unit.source: However, if the number of required bit flags is unknown, is variable, or is greater than 32, use <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> instead.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果必要的位元旗標的數目為未知，是變數，或大於 32，使用<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>改為。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> is in the <xref:System.Collections> namespace; <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> is in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized> namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> 處於<xref:System.Collections>命名空間。<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32>處於<xref:System.Collections.Specialized>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用整數索引來存取此集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Indexes in this collection are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中的索引都以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> and how to print out its values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>以及如何列印其值。

trans-unit.source: Public static (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 公用靜態 (<see langword="Shared" />在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式<see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class whose capacity and initial values can be specified.
An array of Booleans to copy.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that contains bit values copied from the specified array of Booleans.
This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `values`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的項目數`values`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="values" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An array of bytes containing the values to copy, where each byte represents eight consecutive bits.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that contains bit values copied from the specified array of bytes.
The first byte in the array represents bits 0 through 7, the second byte represents bits 8 through 15, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的第一個位元組代表位元 0 到 7，第二個位元組代表位元 8 到 15，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The Least Significant Bit of each byte represents the lowest index value: " `bytes` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `bytes` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `bytes` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 每個位元組的最重要的位元代表最小的索引值:" `bytes` [0] （& s) 1" 代表位元 0、" `bytes` [0] （& s) 代表位元 1、 2"" `bytes` [0] （& s) 4" 代表位元 2，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `bytes`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的項目數`bytes`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bytes" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The length of <paramref name="bytes" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> to copy.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that contains bit values copied from the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `bits`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的項目數`bits`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bits" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The number of bit values in the new <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that can hold the specified number of bit values, which are initially set to <see langword="false" />.
This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
An array of integers containing the values to copy, where each integer represents 32 consecutive bits.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that contains bit values copied from the specified array of 32-bit integers.
The number in the first `values` array element represents bits 0 through 31, the second number in the array represents bits 32 through 63, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 在第一個數字`values`陣列項目代表位元 0 到 31，陣列中的第二個數字代表位元 32 到 63，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The Least Significant Bit of each integer represents the lowest index value: " `values` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `values` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `values` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 每個整數的最重要的位元代表最小的索引值:" `values` [0] （& s) 代表位元 0，1"" `values` [0] （& s) 代表位元 1、 2"" `values` [0] （& s) 4" 代表位元 2，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `values`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的項目數`values`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="values" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The length of <paramref name="values" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />
The number of bit values in the new <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
The Boolean value to assign to each bit.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that can hold the specified number of bit values, which are initially set to the specified value.
This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
The array with which to perform the bitwise AND operation.
Performs the bitwise AND operation between the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object and the corresponding elements in the specified array.
The current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object will be modified to store the result of the bitwise AND operation.
An array containing the result of the bitwise AND operation, which is a reference to the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object.
The bitwise AND operation returns `true` if both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if one or both operands are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 位元 AND 運算傳回`true`如果這兩個運算元都是`true`，並傳回`false`如果一或兩個運算元都是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to perform the bitwise AND operation between two <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行位元 AND 運算，兩個<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="value" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> do not have the same number of elements.
Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
A shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to.
trans-unit.target: 集合的淺層複本只會複製元素的集合，不論它們是參考類型或實值類型，但是不會複製參考所參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to.
trans-unit.target: 新的集合中的參考都指向相同原始集合中的參考所指向的物件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，項目複製集合的深層複本，並直接或間接參考之項目，所有項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The specified array must be of a compatible type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的陣列必須是相容的類型。

trans-unit.source: Only `bool`, `int`, and `byte` types of arrays are supported.
trans-unit.target: 只有`bool`， `int`，和`byte`支援類型的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to copy the elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>複製項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> into a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>到一維<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
The type of the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
Gets the number of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
The number of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中所包含的項目數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A> return the same value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> 和<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>傳回相同的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> can be set to a specific value, but <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> 您可以將特定的值，但<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the value to get.
Gets the value of the bit at a specific position in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
The value of the bit at position <paramref name="index" />.
This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set and get specific elements in a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定和取得特定項目<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than or equal to the number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 並未定義。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在讀取 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 的值之前，必須呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 會將 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 設定為下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>也會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是未定義。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次將 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 之後，接著呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> is read-only.
This property is always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性一律為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> implements the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.IsReadOnly%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> 實作<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性因為的需要<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
This property is always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性一律為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> implements the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.IsSynchronized%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> 實作<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.IsSynchronized%2A>屬性因為的需要<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A>在整個列舉過程。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the value to get or set.
Gets or sets the value of the bit at a specific position in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
The value of the bit at position <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: 位置的位元值<paramref name="index" />。

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[index]`。

trans-unit.source: The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Item%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic implements <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Item%2A> as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 會將 <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Item%2A> 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。設定屬性，也是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Collections.BitArray.Count" />.
Gets or sets the number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A> return the same value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> 和<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>傳回相同的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> can be set to a specific value, but <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> 您可以將特定的值，但<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> is set to a value that is less than <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>, the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> is truncated and the elements after the index `value` -1 are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A>設定的值為小於<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>、<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>會被截斷，以及在索引之後的元素`value`-1 會被刪除。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> is set to a value that is greater than <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>, the new elements are set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A>設為大於 1 的值<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>，新的項目會設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is an O(`n`) operation.
trans-unit.target: 將這個屬性設定為 O (`n`) 作業。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is less than zero.

Inverts all the bit values in the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />, so that elements set to <see langword="true" /> are changed to <see langword="false" />, and elements set to <see langword="false" /> are changed to <see langword="true" />.
The current instance with inverted bit values.
This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to apply NOT to a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何適用於不<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: The array with which to perform the bitwise OR operation.
Performs the bitwise OR operation between the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object and the corresponding elements in the specified array.
The current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object will be modified to store the result of the bitwise OR operation.
An array containing the result of the bitwise OR operation, which is a reference to the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object.
The bitwise OR operation returns `true` if one or both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if both operands are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 位元 OR 運算傳回`true`如果一或兩個運算元都是`true`，並傳回`false`如果這兩個運算元都是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to perform the OR operation between two <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行 OR 運算，兩個<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="value" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> do not have the same number of elements.
The zero-based index of the bit to set.
The Boolean value to assign to the bit.
Sets the bit at a specific position in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> to the specified value.
This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set and get specific elements in a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定和取得特定項目<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than or equal to the number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
The Boolean value to assign to all bits.
Sets all bits in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> to the specified value.
This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set and get specific elements in a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定和取得特定項目<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用以同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> using the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>使用<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A> of the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>, not directly on the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A>的<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>、 直接依據<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> object.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>物件。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A>在整個列舉過程。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: The array with which to perform the bitwise exclusive OR operation.
Performs the bitwise exclusive OR operation between the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object against the corresponding elements in the specified array.
The current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object will be modified to store the result of the bitwise exclusive OR operation.
An array containing the result of the bitwise exclusive OR operation, which is a reference to the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object.
The bitwise exclusive OR operation returns `true` if exactly one operand is `true`, and returns `false` if both operands have the same Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 位元排除 OR 運算傳回`true`如果只有一個運算元為`true`，並傳回`false`如果兩個運算元有相同的布林值。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to perform the XOR operation between two <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行兩個 XOR 作業<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="value" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> do not have the same number of elements.
